Title: Chairman of the Board
Writer: Alfredo Septién (story), Turi Meyer (story), Alfredo Septién (screenplay), Turi Meyer (screenplay), Alex Zamm (screenplay)
Actors: Scott 'Carrot Top' Thompson, Courtney Thorne-Smith, Larry Miller, Raquel Welch
Plot: A surfer and inventor Edison is chosen by his roommates to raise rent with his outrageous (and absurd) inventions. There's no luck in job interviews until he meets billionaire Armand McMillan, who likes him, and leaves his company after his death to Edison. Edison has a lot of success with his inventions while the company's competitors do all they can to destroy him.
